EmailTemplate.subject: Exciting new features in VMTurbo Operations Manager 4.0!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
VMTurbo is pleased to announce the latest release of VMTurbo Operations Manager—version 4.0. The release contains enhancements in the base product, as well as enablements for new add-on modules to control storage resources supporting your virtual environment; and a new add-on module for extending workloads to public cloud infrastructure, such as Amazon Web Services and Microsoft Azure. Learn more about what's new in our press release <http://bit.ly/11da07n> or the release notes on the support site.
Due to the significant changes in this release, the upgrade process has changed. We highly recommend that all customers read this article <http://bit.ly/11sZM1E> on our support site before upgrading. Customers who do not have maintenance agreements and who are interested in benefiting from the new features should contact us <mailto:sales@vmturbo.com> to learn more.
As a reminder, VMTurbo offers comprehensive training programs <http://bit.ly/WbucrR> to meet your organization's specific needs. Our FREE JumpStart training is offered monthly and is available to all customers. The next session is scheduled for Thursday, June 13 <http://bit.ly/12iNAXm> at 12pm ET and Thursday, July 11 <http://bit.ly/16ZXxMk> at 12pm ET. Please contact me if you have any questions regarding the update.
Best regards,
Steve Gorman Director, Customer Support 781-418-5244 steve.gorman@vmturbo.com
